rules.justification: Object ID must be in free range
Field ID must be in free range
No CompanyOpen event subscriptions allowed in PTEs
Must use allowed compilation target for SaaS
Encryption APIs are not allowed in SaaS
ApplicationArea property must be defined for all controls
Moving tables or fields is not allowed in PTE
API Pages must follow structural rules
API Pages must define an API version
API Pages must define a publisher
API Pages must define EntitySetName
API Pages must define EntityName
API Pages must define ODataKeyFields
Avoid including permissions for objects from other applications
Avoid unreachable (dead) code
Remove unused variables to improve code clarity
Do not use identical names for local/global variables and fields
Avoid name collisions between local variables and other symbols
Avoid name collisions for global variables
Variables must be initialized before usage
EventSubscriber methods must be local for safety
Avoid filtering on non-indexed fields for performance
Follow AL naming conventions for maintainability
Use text constants for user messages for localization support
Use labels or constants with StrSubstNo for translation readiness
Tooltip is required for all UI elements
Tooltip value must be filled
Avoid SIFT indexes on primary/unique keys for performance
Caption property must be specified for all fields
Avoid using concatenation or StrSubstNo inside Error() calls
FlowField definitions should be indexed for performance
Table fields must include tooltips
Use FieldCaption instead of FieldName for localization correctness
